name: reit1
description: REIT Site Data Intake, Import, and Administration

scripts.build: npm run build -w packages/shared && npm run build -w apps/api && npm run build -w apps/web
scripts.build:api: npm run build -w packages/shared && npm run build -w apps/api
scripts.build:web: npm run build -w packages/shared && npm run build -w apps/web
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w packages/shared && npm run lint -w apps/api && npm run lint -w apps/web
